content.title: Bit S.p.A - Software Engineer
content.subtitle: Mar 2022 – Present
content.description: Developed scalable web and desktop applications using Spring Boot, Angular, WPF, and Oracle DBMS; deployed microservices with Jenkins and Azure; integrated Apache Camel for backend processes.

content.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science - University of Pegaso
content.description: Focused on software development, algorithms, and practical project implementations.

content.title: Master in Software Engineering - Boolean Careers
content.description: Intensive 700-hour program in frontend and backend web development, culminating in a comprehensive food delivery application developed in a collaborative team environment.

content.title: Master's Degree in Security Engineering - University of Pegaso
content.description: Specialized in cybersecurity, network security, and workplace safety.

content.title: Bachelor's Degree in Civil Engineering - University of Pegaso
content.description: Specialized in structural and geotechnical engineering with practical construction management experience.

elements.description: Developed a hotel booking and reservation web application using Python, HTML, and CSS. The aim was to reconstruct a basic framework for routing and scalability using fundamental tools. Features include user authentication, room availability checks, and booking management.
A symptom-analysis web app using machine learning to suggest possible diseases and provide detailed health information based on user input.
Team project of a food delivery web app inspired by Deliveroo, featuring restaurant browsing, menus, order tracking, authentication, and secure payment processing.

sections.secondaryTitleText: Discuss a project or just say hi—my inbox is open!
